item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Entra role
item.description:
Id: db506228-d27e-4b7d-95e5-295956d6615f
Display name: Agent ID Administrator
Description: Manage all aspects of agents in a tenant including identity lifecycle operations for agent blueprints, agent service principals, agent identities, and agentic users.
